title: What is the interpretation of seeing dancing in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Dancing in a dream for a married woman: Interpretations regarding a dream about dancing vary, as some indicate good and others indicate evil according to the details appearing in the dream itself, in addition to the circumstances surrounding the dreamer in reality, so we will seek help from the opinions of superiors. Interpreters for you know the interpretations of a dream about dancing for a married woman through our website. Dancing in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about dancing for a married woman shows the bad psychological state she is experiencing at the present time, especially if the dance was reckless and in a noisy atmosphere, as it leads to increased pressure on her and subjects her to a lot. From harassment. Attack and criticism from those around her in real life. Quiet dancing is one of the signs of moving to a new stage of success and noticeable positive changes. Some translation experts also indicated that dancing with loud and annoying music is one of the unpleasant signs that indicate that you will hear sad news related to the loss of a loved one with insight. , which may be a relative or friend. Being exposed to some shocks and disturbances in her life. If he sees a woman he knows in reality dancing inappropriately in a dream, this indicates her bad behavior and dirty morals, so he should beware of her and try to avoid her so as not to push her onto the path of death and sadness. Dancing is one of the symbols of great material losses that the dreamer is going through. Extreme distress cannot be overcome easily, and God knows best. Dancing in a dream for Ibn Sirin’s married wife. Ibn Sirin stressed the undesirable signs of the dream, as it indicates numerous disputes and problems in the life of a married woman, as... She is likely to suffer greatly as a result of the marital disputes and conflicts that plague her life. Family and the existence of a point of understanding between the dreamer and the husband, which makes her life calm and peace of mind. If the fortuneteller follows many bad habits, such as crying, gossiping, and other reprehensible actions, and is afraid to reveal her secrets to people, then seeing herself dancing against her will in front of others or dancing in the street is a warning. She is against continuing these vices because her scandals will be revealed and she will be exposed to major scandals sooner or later. In the event that the dreamer suffers from some adversities and crises in reality and feels the weight of worries on her shoulders, then seeing her dancing to soothing tunes indicates abundant kindness, sustenance, and prosperity, God willing. Dancing in A dream for a pregnant womanDespite the unpleasant interpretations of dancing in most cases, there are details that can change the interpretation of the dream and put it on the list of praiseworthy visions, that is, if the dreamer is pregnant in reality and sees herself dancing in calm rhythms and swaying soberly. Happiness was one of the sure signs, and she would give birth soon and easily, free of hardship and suffering. It also promised her that she would be reassured about the health of her fetus and that things would be fine. Violent or excessive dancing is considered one of the sure indicators of the harsh conditions she is currently going through as a result of pregnancy problems and complications, and there is a possibility that She undergoes a difficult and painful birth. Going smoothly

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in Ibn Sirin’s poetry and its implications

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about lice in hair It is not necessary that the dream about lice that the sleeper saw or the notes that the sleeper sees belong to him and that its elements mean him personally, as the dream may be related to his country, his family, or someone from other people, because for this reason, each of the symbols in the dream has evidence that you must focus on through your interpretation, and in this regard, we find that the dream about lice in the hair. Interpretation of a dream about removing lice from the hair of an unmarried woman Removing lice in a dream, whether for a single or married woman or for a man, has good meanings and bodes well for the dreamer, as it means the dreamer’s liberation from the crises and problems that accompanied him. Interpretation of a dream about removing lice from a single woman's hair: Removing lice from a single man's hair means getting rid of the psychological crises he suffers from. Also, killing lice in an unmarried woman's dream means that she will work to pay off debts and get rid of them in the near future. Also, killing lice in an unmarried woman's dream indicates getting rid of enemies and overcoming them. Killing lice in a dream indicates improving the dreamer's conditions. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that lice are spreading in her hair, this means that the unmarried woman will be late in marriage. Some scholars interpreted the interpretation that lice in an unmarried woman's dream means that she will marry a person who does not respect, appreciate, or make her happy. If the hair is combed and the hair falls from it to the ground, this is a good vision, and an end to her problems and marriage for her soon, God willing. But seeing it falling in her clothes is an unhealthy marriage or engagement experience for her, and it will not be completed, and he is a deceiver and a liar who approaches her and lies to her, and you must be careful and think carefully. See also: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for an unmarried woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail Interpretation of seeing lice in my daughter’s hair A married woman can see lice in her daughter’s hair in a dream, and according to what commentators say, this vision does not bode well, especially if it affects her eldest daughter, as this means some problems that she will suffer because of her daughter. Here is everything related to the interpretation of seeing lice in my daughter's hair: If a mother sees lice in her daughter's hair in a dream, this indicates some problems that the girl is suffering from. Her daughter also needs her support and encouragement. If a mother sees lice in her youngest daughter's hair in a dream, this indicates the presence of bad friends in this girl's life and means that the mother should be careful of them. Seeing lice in a girl's hair can also indicate the presence of some pitfalls in the girl's life and can indicate some problems. The interpretation of seeing lice in my daughter's hair indicates that lice in the girl's hair are the result of the academic stumbling that the dreamer is going through. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about combing hair and lice falling out of it and killing them A person may see lice falling from his hair while combing it, which is one of the visions that disgusts the dreamer. Scholars have interpreted this vision with different interpretations that we explain to you in the following points:

title: The 100 most important interpretations of a dream about boiled eggs by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about boiled eggs: Boiled eggs are one of the foods rich in protein, and seeing them in a dream has many different meanings for their owner, some of which portend goodness and others lead to the opposite, and their meaning becomes clear by knowing the facts contained in the dream and its condition. The dreamer in a dream in this article. Interpretation of a dream about boiled eggs: Seeing boiled eggs in a dream has many connotations and meanings, the most important of which are: If the dreamer sees boiled eggs in his dream, this is a sign that he is a dreamer and ambitious and has many goals that he wants to achieve. If the dreamer sees boiled eggs in If the dreamer is a man and sees in his dream that he is eating boiled eggs, then he will make the decision to get married soon. If one sees in a dream that he has received boiled eggs, this is a sign that there is a lot of food and a lot of loot that he will receive without any problems in the coming season. Seeing boiled eggs in the dreamer’s dream indicates a life full of good things, gifts, prosperity, and blessed sustenance, as well as luck. Happy in his life. Interpretation of a dream about boiled eggs by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the meanings associated with seeing boiled eggs in a dream, which are: Seeing boiled eggs in the dreamer’s dream indicates a high standard of living, wealth, and a high position in society. The vision also shows the individual’s desire to perform all He performs the tasks required of him in his job with absolute mastery. If a person holds boiled eggs in his hand in a dream, this vision is promising and indicates the date of his upcoming wedding. Seeing boiled eggs in the dream of an oppressed person indicates God’s victory for him, his innocence of the charges against him, and the restoration of his full rights from those who wronged him in the near future. Urgent. The dream of small-sized boiled eggs in a woman’s dream symbolizes that God will grant her the birth of females in the near future. If the dreamer’s husband sells eggs in real life and she sees in her dream a lot of boiled eggs, then this dream is praiseworthy and indicates the success of her partner’s business and earning a lot of money. Money from this coming period. Interpretation of a dream about boiled eggs for unmarried women. The interpretation of a dream about eggs in a single woman’s dream shows many indications, the most important of which are: If the dreamer is single and a diligent student in reality and sees boiled eggs in her dream, she will reach the pinnacle of glory and achieve overwhelming success. In the scientific field and are placed in prestigious places. If an unrelated girl sees boiled eggs in her dream, this is a clear indication that the aspirations and goals she has sought for a long time have been achieved. Seeing boiled eggs burning in the dream of an unrelated girl means That her future partner will be a young man with good morals and a similar personality. A boiled egg in a dream for an unmarried woman is a promise. A praiseworthy vision expresses that she enjoys complete health and that her body is free from

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cup of coffee in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cup of coffee in a dream, seeing coffee has many meanings and interpretations, the dreamer tries to learn the meaning of seeing a cup of coffee in a dream for a man, a woman and a pregnant woman, and seeing coffee in a dream indicates an unmarried marriage for a girl as well as for a single young man because it indicates a pregnancy for a married woman, and coffee indicates the cessation of pain and fatigue and seeing a group of coffee cups in a dream for a married woman. It may indicate happiness and stability in her married life. Seeing a cup of coffee for a single woman Interpretation of a cup of coffee in a dream for a single girl, and this indicates that she will get married soon. Many cups that a girl dreams of are evidence of a relationship or marriage soon with her. Seeing a cup of coffee for a married woman Seeing a married woman offering cups of coffee to a group of people indicates an improvement in her relationship with her husband. Seeing a married woman giving her husband a cup of coffee means that she will soon become pregnant. Drinking a cup of Arabic coffee symbolizes the priest's trip to one of the Gulf countries. Also, seeing a cup of coffee in a dream is a sign that you will achieve what you want and get rid of problems. Breaking a coffee cup in a married woman's dream means that she has lost one of her close relatives. Seeing a married woman buying coffee cups indicates the stability of her married life. Seeing coffee also means satisfying desires. Seeing yourself drinking coffee in a dream indicates stability and family happiness. Seeing coffee in a dream means that life will change for the better. Seeing empty coffee cups indicates fatigue and discomfort. If a married woman dreams that she is offering a cup of coffee to her husband, this indicates that she is expecting a new baby. Seeing a cup of coffee For a pregnant woman, seeing a cup of coffee for a pregnant woman is evidence of getting rid of pregnancy problems. Seeing coffee cups in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth to her child in peace. If a pregnant woman sees herself drinking coffee in a dream, the vision indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful woman. Seeing a coffee cup for a man The interpretation of seeing a coffee cup in a dream for a married man indicates that his wife will soon become pregnant. The interpretation of a dream about an empty coffee cup in a divorced woman's dream is evidence that she will return to her ex-husband again. Seeing an empty coffee cup in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of losing her husband. Seeing an empty coffee cup in a man's dream is evidence of his excessive thinking about the affairs of his life and an indication that he is waiting for a certain matter to be completed. An empty coffee cup for a girl is an indication of many problems in her life. Empty cups in a dream also symbolize the emotional and psychological emptiness of unmarried couples, and their need for money in abundance. Seeing empty cups can indicate fatigue and discomfort. And about material losses, seeing a white cup of coffee. Eating a white cup of coffee in a dream is a sign of good news for the fortune teller. Seeing a white cup in a married woman’s dream indicates the fulfillment of her desires. A white cup of coffee for a pregnant woman is a sign of her safety and the safety of her child. A cup of coffee in a dream is a sign of abundance.

title: Postman in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the site of dream interpretation and vision expression. The topic of this article revolves around the interpretation of seeing a postman in a dream and the meanings associated with that in the dream of a man and a woman: single and married, as well as pregnant. Interpretation of the postman in a dream: The postman in a dream symbolizes the messenger who tells you about a matter or news and what he conveys, some of which is good and some of which is bad, and likewise The postman in a dream is necessarily linked to messages. The interpretation of a dream about a postman depends on his appearance and appearance. If he is elegant, polite, and wears elegant and clean clothes, then he promises either success, travel, money, or marriage. As for the postman who appears in a dream wearing clothes with a face Pale or ugly looking, this indicates something bad and the news of the letter may be bad. Sometimes a postman in a dream symbolizes the future. The better they are in the dream in terms of appearance, behavior and speech, this indicates a bright and successful future. But if he appears angry, violent, or moody, the dream indicates the difficult days that the dreamer will face and he must face them with all patience and determination to end the passage, and not always. The appearance of a postman in a dream indicates that the dreamer is waiting for an expected order or event, and most often it is the postman. A sign of acceptance or approval if the dreamer expects a response from an individual or administration. Interpretation of seeing a postman in a man’s dream: A postman in one dream indicates that the fortuneteller is waiting for an important matter mainly related to his professional and social future. An indicator and happy news or positive messages urging the viewer to put in more effort and try to achieve maximum success and wealth. Interpretation of seeing a postman in one dreamIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she receives a letter or something like that from the postman, this means important news He will come to her in a few days. Perhaps the dream indicates a happy event if the postman is happy and smiling. Seeing a postman in a dream may be related to a marriage or engagement event. A postman in a dream is married and pregnant. As for a postman in a married woman’s dream, it can also indicate a happy event or a series in which there is hope and expectation. News is on its way. If a married woman sees that the postman gives her money or money, this is an expression of pregnancy, thanking God. However, if she sees that he gives her a precious gift, the dream means that the married woman receives something good related to her husband or her livelihood. The postman in a pregnant woman’s dream can mean good. Kindness in any matter is one of the symbols of healing or salvation, and seeing it in any way is a sign of the approaching date of delivery. Conclusion: Thus, we friends have finished interpreting the vision of a postman in a dream, and we will meet, God willing, with a new topic of dream interpretation. Until then, you have our best wishes for health. And longevity.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver Watching the dreamer in a dream driving a car and walking without a driver leads to constant thinking with fear and anxiety about his future, and the dreamer may want to achieve many achievements in his life, and many dreamers search for this, in order to know the interpretation of this vision that we will explain through our article. Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver Interpretation of dreams about driving a car without a driver while a woman is sleeping, indicating that she is committing many great sins that if she does not stop and fix it as soon as possible, God will punish her severely. Seeing a car driving without a driver in a man's dream indicates many unfavorable changes that harm him and make him feel unwelcome in his personal life and always feel anxious, uncomfortable and reassured about his future. Interpretation of a dream about a car driving without a driver by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin interprets that seeing a car driving without a driver in the dreamer's dream indicates the occurrence of many undesirable things that will be imposed on him and will put him in a very bad position. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that the dream of a car driving without a driver is an indication that the owner of the dream will join a job in which there are many problems and pressures that she cannot bear, and this will make her leave it. Her job soon. Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type a site about Secrets of Dream Interpretation Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of a car driving without a driver for individuals If a single woman sees in her dream driving a car without a driver, this means that she will find a job that is not suitable for her goals and does not want it. Seeing a car driving without a driver in a dream means that he does not have good behavior in his life affairs and this causes him to fall into many major problems. Many scholars of interpretation also mentioned that seeing a car driving without a driver in a person's dream indicates the occurrence of very bad things that will affect his life. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman driving without a driver Many scholars have interpreted that a married woman who sees in her dream a car driving without a driver indicates that she is doing some wrong things and also hiding many secrets from her entire family. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a sick person recovering in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person being healed in a dream: A Muslim is exposed to all the pains in the life of this world, and this is a test and a test of the extent of the Muslim’s insistence on the truth and the patience of the distress that befalls him, as the Muslim deserves to be patient if distress occurs, and to resort to God Almighty and help him escape from that distress. Examples of distress include suffering from an incurable disease or loss. From a loved one, or sadness and distress, and many more, and in this article we will list the signs. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person recovering in a dream. Well-being is a blessing from God that only those who lose it can appreciate. When a person is afflicted with any disease, no matter how severe or mild, he feels the value of his health and well-being without realizing it, but what? Interpretation of the dream of seeing a sick person being treated in a dream according to the most famous interpreters: If a person sees in his dream the recovery of a sick person while in reality he is suffering from an illness. The vision is the news of his recovery from his illness soon, if the patient is close to God. But if someone sees in his dream a sick person being healed, he does not know it. This is a sign of religious commitment. Perhaps the vision showed his distance from sins and transgressions. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see an unclean place for a son What is the interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream being healed? Illness is a type of affliction that afflicts some people, and the person suffering from the disease must ask God for help, be patient with the most important thing, and pray to God for recovery with certainty of the answer. A person is healed in a dream: When a man sees in his dream a sick person who has been cured of the disease. This indicates that he has overcome many obstacles and difficulties in his life. It also indicates the alleviation of anxiety and the disappearance of anxiety and distress. And if the sick child sees that he has been cured of the disease. The vision indicates That he will achieve something great in the future. A man can become a scholar with a lot of knowledge. People will benefit from his knowledge. See also the interpretation of a dream about a gold chain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing a sick person in a dream. When a person is afflicted with an illness, illness, or disease, he searches for a treatment that relieves the pain, And the severity of the pain that affects him, and he can go to the specialist doctor according to the type of disease, and this framework is set. In your hands are the consequences of seeing a sick person in a dream: Seeing a sick person in a dream indicates a change in the situation and a change for the better. It is also an indication of solving the problems that the dreamer is going through. It is also a symbol of overcoming crises that only God Almighty can handle. While Interpretation of a dream about a patient walking indicates comfort and almost recovery indeed. It is also a sign of hope and optimism. In the event of a visit to a patient with a minor illness, this indicates some changes in the dreamer’s life. See alsoInterpretation of a dream about watching TV for a single and married woman in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about a sick person being healed Healing is the absolute desire of a person who is exhausted by illness and tired of pain and fatigue, so we will tell you the clearest evidence about the interpretation of a dream about a sick person being healed for a single person: Seeing a sick person being healed in a dream is one of the visions worthy of praise. It indicates the abundant goodness that will come to this girl’s life. K.

title: Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a married man and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of engagement in a dream for married men and women according to Ibn Sirin. The dream of engagement is one of the dreams that many people dream of in a dream and because it is considered one of the most beautiful dreams that many girls dream of, because it is considered one of the dreams that are considered wishes for them, meaning that they wish to To be fulfilled, and as it is considered an indicator of goodness and happiness, and since engaging in real life, especially if it is from someone you love. Or you know, an unparalleled source of happiness and joy, and the same thing happens with courtship in a dream, as it is a clear indicator of many positives associated with the person who sees it, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about engagement in a dream for a married man and a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about engagement. In a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, the dream of engagement in a dream has many interpretations. We know that every girl and guy wants to take the step of courtship in preparation for marriage, and because engagement is one of the events that causes happiness for all people, seeing it in a dream has many different interpretations, which are as follows: In the event that a girl sees For a virgin in a dream that she is engaged, this means that this girl will obtain a prestigious position and a respectable job. If one sees in a dream that he is attending an engagement, this means that the dreamer will achieve all his desires and goals in the shortest possible time. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a married woman in A dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about engagement with a single woman. Engagement is considered one of the most popular dreams for many people, whether the dreamer is married, single, or even divorced, young, old, old, or even young. The interpretation of a dream about an engagement with a single woman is as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is engaged and that she is happy and has a beautiful appearance, this means that this girl needs an emotional connection and finding a suitable life partner. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her lover is engaged, then this It means that this girl desperately wants to be close to this person, and his appearance to her in a dream indicates her strong connection to him and her urgent desire for him. . To communicate with him. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is engaged, this means that this girl will be blessed by God Almighty with a person of high standing and well-off and she will live with him in a happy and dignified life. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that one of her mahrams is proposing to marry her, this is a sign May God Almighty guide her with an abundance of goodness, joy, and happiness that she will attain in the shortest period of time. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a whip in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s engagement. If a married woman dreams of her engagement, this is an indication that one of her children is approaching engagement, and it may indicate the love of her husband’s family for this woman. Married woman. Being engaged in the life of a married woman is clear evidence of goodness, happiness and living in her life. Being engaged to a married woman in a dream means that all the problems she faces will be solved. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a married man: In the event that one sees a married man in a dream in reality that he proposes marriage From F

title: Interpretation of wearing a dress in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Wearing a dress in a dream for a single woman. A dress is a type of women’s clothing that everyone loves. It is steeped in elegance and beauty. Many women strive to choose the color that they love and that suits them, and when a girl sees that she is wearing it. The dream, waking up to learn its interpretation, and in this article we look together at the most important things that commentators said about this vision. Wearing a dress in a dream for a single woman. Scientists believe that the interpretation of wearing a dress in a dream for an unmarried woman has many interpretations, depending on its shape, whether it is short or Long and colourful. It is formed as follows: If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a long dress in a dream, this indicates a good reputation and people talk about her a lot. And if a girl dreams that she is wearing a long dress, this means that she will be blessed with a good man who will make her happy. If a girl sees that she is wearing a dress Of happy colors in a dream, it means happiness, pleasure, and news that she will be happy with soon. And when the dreamer sees that she is wearing her engagement dress, this indicates that he is close to her or that many positive changes will happen to her. And if the girl is sick and sees in her dream that she is wearing a silver dress , it means that she is about to recover quickly. If you still do not find what you are looking for? Log in from Google to a site about the secrets of dream interpretation and see everything that interests you. Wearing a dress in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a girl wearing a dress in a dream means that she has good morals and will soon have a good husband. And when a girl sees that she is wearing a dress White, this means that she will enjoy great wealth and will obtain a lot of money. But if the dreamer sees that he is buying a dress and when he wears it, it is shortened, this means that he is taking wrong steps. And when the Virgin Mary sees that she is wearing a white dress, it predicts the great goodness that she will obtain and the abundant food that she will obtain. And if the dreamer sees that he is wearing the dress after buying it and it is loose, then this indicates the modesty and piety that he enjoys. Wearing a red dress in a dream for a single woman. Interpreters believe that wearing a red dress in a dream means that the dreamer will obtain many good things, and when the girl sees That she is wearing a long red dress, this means that she will be blessed with happiness and blessings in her life. Some believe that wearing a red dress in a dream portends a close marriage to a good man, and if a girl is studying and sees herself wearing a red dress in a dream, this means that she will be blessed with great privilege and achieve everything. What she has. Objectives: Wearing a black dress in a dream for a single woman. Jurists say that wearing a black dress in the dream of an unmarried woman, if she is in a happy state, is an unexpected vision that carries an atmosphere of extreme sadness and calamity that will affect her and her status among people. Also, wearing a black dress In one's dream it does not indicate marriage because it is a color that does not express feelings and emotional feelings, as

title: Interpretation of a dream about a neck

preview.html: We have various dreams during our sleep, and these dreams are signs and signals. Show us something specific and we will explain it. You may also be interested in meeting someone who I know is sick in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an earring in a dream, which has many meanings, as the earring was an essential piece of jewelry for females several ages ago, and there are explanations that explain the vision Earring in a dream, and we will explain that in the following lines. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream is evidence for the interpretation of seeing the neck in a dream. The opinions of the interpreters differed regarding seeing earrings in a dream, and among these interpretations is the interpretation of the great scholar Ibn Sirin, who explained that a woman seeing earrings in a dream if she is pregnant indicates a type of pregnancy. The child who gives birth, gives birth. It has also been reported that this dream may indicate that the person will get a job or work in the field of music. This vision also means that the dark-haired person offers rights to everyone around him, if he is one of those with money, and there are many interpretations of this dream, Which shows clear connotations about the person who saw the dream. Read also: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the neck by Ibn Sirino. The respected scholar explained the interpretation of seeing the neck in a dream, as he confirmed that if a person sees shaving during his sleep, this is evidence of his desire to enjoy many different songs. And if a couple sees This dream, and if the husband sees in his dream that there is an earring in his wife’s ear, then this is evidence of the approaching or emergence of a divorce between the spouses. He explained that if he sees in a dream a pearl earring, this is evidence that this person has memorized the entire Qur’an. The dream of the neck is one of The silver type is evidence of great experience in science, and these are the interpretations of the great scholar Ibn Sirin for seeing the neck in a simplified way. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing the neck in a dream for a man. The interpretations explained that if a man sees in his dream that he is wearing an earring or ear jewelry, this is an indication that something is wrong, It indicates that this person will work in the field of music or work in using various musical instruments, and this is considered a disturbing topic. But the interpretation differs if the dreamer’s wife lives during her pregnancy, such as if a man sees gold earrings and his wife is pregnant, this is evidence that he will be blessed with a child. He sees in a dream that his wife is wearing a special type of silver earring, then this is evidence that she will give birth to a girl. And seeing a man’s neck if the earring is made of silver is evidence that goodness will come to him. And if he sees in a dream an earring made of pearls, this indicates an abundance of knowledge and goodness. In the world. The interpretation of seeing the neck in a dream explained that seeing the neck for a man if he is in the stage of maturity and does not have the desired meaning, and this is evidence that this dream is not good for the one who saw this dream. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Neck dream in a dream for a single girl. The girl may dream in her dream of getting a specific gift, and if she sees that she is getting jewelry as a gift, which is earrings or earrings, then this is evidence of the marriage of the unmarried girl.
